::DarkMouse::

(sees what is happening.  The new spaceship is firing on Grimlock.)
"hehe, better him than me at this point."(chuckling to herself)
(continues to watch from a few dunes away)
"Hmmm, since they are firing, at Grimlock who is a Maximal, I wonder if they 
would be a bit more friendly to a Predicon."
(watches with wonder and caution on her mind.  The sand is hot under her 
paws while she is in Mouse mode.  The ship is nothing like what she has seen 
before.  She wonders what and who is inside.)






____________________________________________________________
>::: Set, drunk on the fact that he out gunned the Maximal, activated one of
>the two main missle launcers in the front of the ship. The left was 
>destroyed
>in the battle. The right one shot out a missle a meter in length, it headed
>right for Grimlock. :::
>
>::: Set ::: That should finish him.....though, I shouldnt waste such
>expensive wepons on pitiful beings such as Maximals...
